It‚Äôs awesome! I love it! Even more now with the new updates it makes it a lot easier to track every single thing I eat. It‚Äôs what I used to lose weight the first time and it helped me out a lot. I‚Äôm excited to use it again.

Almost not wort it When this app first came out it was completely free. It showed, in great detail, everything you would need to help stay on a healthy diet and monitor ALL the small metrics of the food you ate. Now you have to pay to see those critical numbers. Not sure why I still use the app anymore. I'm not asking for customized diets or exercise plans or discounts on UA apparel, I just want to know what exactly what my daily sodium, fats, protein, etc intakes are. The old was was much better.
Better than Just a Calorie Counter! Sure, this app counts calories but it uses a wide variety of measurements & includes decimals.
Great app!... but I love the app! Using it and exercising more, I‚Äôve been able to lose nearly 40lbs!

Use to love it I use to love this app. It is probably still the best one, but I don't like the new update. More importantly it crashes all the time and I have restart it. I have been using this app for 9 years and have lost 130 lbs. Still have about 15 lbs to go and would just love it if you would fix it and I could change my review back to 5 stars!

App freezes all the time When this app is not freezing, it‚Äôs pretty cool and useful as a weight loss tool.  Lately, it freezes all the time and needs restarted. I can‚Äôt even log an entire meal in the food dairy without it freezing up. Very time consuming and frustrating.  This is a known issue that has not been fixed.  I may need to log my meals online instead of using this app

My Fitness Pal Just keeping a log and staying accountable has helped me take off pounds without effort! The hardest part is just logging it! I‚Äôm loving this app and I am thrilled! I may have to get a subscription to see just to tap into the full potential

Finally losing a little My doctor installed this App on my phone at my last visit. At first, I saw no loss at all but now I have lost 3 pounds in 2 weeks and 3 days. That‚Äôs great for me because it is very difficult for me to lose ANY weight. I woke up encouraged.

Weight control I love this app and recommend it to my friends. The diary is a perfect tool when paying attention to what goes in you mouth. I wanted to start with an easy goal and every day I would log in what I weighed. This app kept me motivated.

Accurate data one of the best fitness apps around When I need to be serious about tracking my food this is the app to use. With my fitness pal it has helped me to lose 40 lbs. and to maintain the weight to stay healthy

Log-In Requirements An otherwise wonderful App, but PLEASE change the App back to keeping users logged in, instead of requiring users to manually log in (and re-accept terms) EVERY SINGLE TIME - and without even a touch/face-ID feature.  I‚Äôve been a daily user of this App for YEARS, and this incredibly time-consuming change is absolutely ruining the App‚Äôs usefulness, particularly for those (like myself) who make and/or access entries multiple times each day.

Not accurately syncing to Fitbit Some days it will accurately record my steps and calories burned but most days it says I have burned like 10 calories after walking/running 5 miles.  It used to sync perfectly every time but the past few weeks have been wonky.  I track all meals and for the most part that function serves my purpose.  I would give 5 stars of it was syncing properly.

Helpful app I appreciate the information I get from this app. I‚Äôm learning a great deal about my eating habits ands making important changes. There is more I need from it, though. I need the app to differentiate between simple carbs and complex carbs. I also need it to show me how much of the sugar I eat is added sugar vs. naturally occurring sugar.

Better than weight watchers Only when I use this app do I lose weight! Helped me go from 201 in 2018 down to 165 by 2019...now going all the way with this app! I love that it‚Äôs free and easy to use! I compared it with weight-watchers, it‚Äôs all the same, except free!

Incorrect Data and Poor Syncing I‚Äôve been using this app for a long while now and even sprung for the premium/paid features. Recently I‚Äôve been trying to use it to track macros but good luck because the macros and calories listed for most foods do not work out correctly. (The math is simple but rarely correct). Additionally, if you want to add things between devices the app rarely syncs properly even when you try to force sync from the menu.

Latest release is buggy I‚Äôve used MFP on and off for close to a decade now. Ever since UnderArmor purchased it, the app has steadily declined in quality. This recent update has me looking into other meal tracking apps because I‚Äôm so frustrated. It logs me out multiple times a week. I can‚Äôt join any challenges. When I try to save a recipe it freezes and I have to force restart. What in the world is going on?

Logging for 60 days, life changer! This app is great, so far I‚Äôve lost 15 pounds after logging for two months! It‚Äôs very user friendly and although the premium version has some interesting features, it‚Äôs not necessary to get full usage out of MFP. LOVE IT.

What happened to the restaurant feature? This is still a great app but the restaurant grouping feature seems to be broken or have been removed. Looking at all menu items for popular restaurants made logging a breeze. It‚Äôs still easy, but a bit more tedious/fiddly now.
Solid app for dieting I both love and hate this app. The diet tracking is nearly perfect. If only the interface was a bit more streamlined and included time stamps options.

No way to edit comments on status. Also whenever go to the community forum and press done it takes me all the way back to the main menu and I lose my place and the comment I was on and everything. There is no simple back button that will take me back to the previous post I was on.

Keeps freezing and not working I normally love this app! But lately it keeps freezing on me and not responding and not allowing me to add items or giving me the option to scan food.  Is this a bug that you guys are working on cause it‚Äôs annoying that I have to keep completely exiting out of it and restarting everything

Meh Decent app. Closes almost always for no reason and freezes every time I use it which is especially frustrating when creating a recipe, which often times takes upwards of 20 minutes because of how often it freezes. Make sure when logging food you do it quickly or you will have to start over. Otherwise it‚Äôs okay.

Great idea, but it freezes all the time!! I‚Äôm continuing to use the app, though it freezes all the time. The food options and ease of entering my own recipes and meals are great. I frequently have to reopen the app (at least once a day), and have even had to delete/reinstall the app once because it became unresponsive.

Freezes Often I have been using this app for years, it‚Äôs been great. But, after the past few iOS updates it‚Äôs been freezing multiple times a day. I‚Äôve found myself having to restart the app after it freezing from simply searching or adding one item.. it can be really annoying.

MyFitnessPal is good,  but panders too much for us to buy the upgrade The app is good in that it helps calculate calories from store bought meals and restaurants.  I‚Äôm not that thrilled about the format, in that it shows all these locked features.   The monthly fee for the upgrade  is kind of high just to calculate calories.  The free version does do a good job of estimating calories though
Having a hard time! I always have problems with this app. It takes so long when I‚Äôm trying to record on my food diary. And the serving sizes in some cases should be listed as cups and their not.

It won‚Äôt let me make a account ‚òπÔ∏è This app for some reason when I fill out the login information is fine but when I try to continue to fill out more it says ‚ÄúSorry, we are unable to process your registration at this time‚Äù. This error is not a one time thing, I have tried on various occasions and even have deleted and downloaded the app again with no other results. If someone could fix this please that would be great.

Great app, now too slow Used the app for years, but it is so sluggish now that it is simply unusable. I have a lot of custom recipes that they‚Äôve saved from over 3 years ago, I can view old diaries of my food intake, but that all is simply not enough for me to shoulder the frustration of waiting 2-3 seconds in between each letter in the search bar or 5-10 seconds when switching tabs.

Not Syncing properly with Apple Health App Love the app, recording foods, tracking carbs, protein, fat etc. The food diary is an excellent source of info. But I can‚Äôt give a five-star rating because MFP does not sync well on my iPhone 6. Some of the data is there, but not all, days of data will be missing. Syncing does not seem to help.

The app is horribly buggy I love this app and I have been using it for years now, but recently the app has been quite buggy. While using the app, it crashes way too often and is very laggy. I like the information within the app and I have a lot of my own food information on the app as well, but the app is slowing down my phone and it crashes all the time. Please fix this.

Works sometimes I like the app but get very frustrated because it does not sync correctly with my fit bit and sometimes it does not sync at all. I check my Fitbit app and it says that I have 12,000 steps but MyFitnessPal says 578 even after I go into more and sync it. Today I had 14,000 steps and it gave me 523 calories, then I git 15,334 steps and it took calories away and dropped down to 446. Just doesn‚Äôt work.
Terrible Customer Service No way to contact anyone when there is a problem. You try to email but can‚Äôt get through screen after screen of those stupid photo tiles. Disgusting!

Great app, minor nuisance... There‚Äôs a lot to love about this app. It‚Äôs clearly the best nutrition and fitness tracker for multiple reasons. The only concern I have is that it doesn‚Äôt deduct breastfeeding from your calories on the app but does on the website, so much so that you‚Äôll get two different estimates for what you‚Äôll weigh in 5 weeks depending on whether you complete the entry on the app or the website. (Giving 1 star to get developers‚Äô attention... will update to 5 when it‚Äôs fixed)

A great app turned horrible This app used to be awesome for tracking foods and exercise.  However, since it latest update, it doesn't work.  All of my foods have been deleted, my diary is not saving, and I get relentless (and I mean RELENTLESS) ads for their "premium" service.  It's truly obnoxious.  Why would I buy premium when the free app doesn't even work?  This is truly one of the worst apps around, which is sad because it was great before apparent greed took over at the developer.

My Pal for Lifelong I love MyFitnessPal!  It keeps me focused and on task.  When I faithfully use the app I have tremendous success with losing and maintaining weight loss.  I enjoy the health tips, exercise recommendations and the healthy recipes!  MyFitnessPal is my Pal for life and I highly recommend it to friends, co-workers and family!‚ù§Ô∏èüôåüèªüí™üèª

Apple Watch Prompt & 3rd party keyboard bugs 1) Ever since the last update I keep getting the "Setting up your Apple Watch" prompt every time I open up the app even though I'VE ALREADY DONE IT.  Small but but needs to be fixed.

My Fitness Pal and Fitbit I rate My Fitness Pal 5 star for ease of use and compatibility with Fitbit.  Very easy to see where I am at in a day, how many calories I have left, and nutritional breakdown.  I appreciate the dream of ''if everyday is like today you will weigh_____in 5 weeks'. Boy how i wish....

Best I Have Found The free level and f this app is the best I have found for input and nutrition tracking. Have not gone pro because what I need right now is in the free level. Has been helpful in my weight loss goals (30 lbs lost so far over 4 months).

Seriously Get This App I got this app back in 2016. I lost 49 pounds with it! Then I got pregnant, gained it back. Now I‚Äôve been using it again and have lost 25 pounds, working towards 50! As long as you can always remember to enter in your food, this app is literally the best.

Not suitable for macro counting You cannot log in grams for most items. Many items do not have accurate calories when you add up the macros. Overall the database is very large and the user interface is easy to use. The recipe feature does not work. When typing in the ingredients, after each letter, my keyboard disappears.

Remember! Love this app because it helps me remember with its reminders who I promised myself to be when it comes to food consumption, water intake and exercise. So easy to use, once you catch on, even for an old guy! On my way and am finally losing some lbs.

Won‚Äôt sync Now that I have my Polar, and use the Polar Beat app, I find it extremely annoying that my Polar is set to sync to the iPhone Health app which is set to sync with MFP, and after 2 days of initially using and it syncing, it hasn‚Äôt since. Frustrating as I‚Äôve deleted and downloaded all apps and realigned to sync to each other, and sent an email, and not even a response to that from customer service.

Good app but I feel like I pay a premium for the app but I do get annoyed that when I do a high intensity workout on my Apple Watch it‚Äôs the only thing that doesn‚Äôt sync. All other cardio workouts will sync with the app but high intensity will not.... the little things get annoying. Before all the iOS and watch updates this used to all work seamlessly.

Never easier I have tried several of these type of apps and this is the best by far. The reminders are great and the progress projections are motivating. Bottom line, it is so simple you cannot not use it. Forgive my English. I are a engineer.

Love it but.... I‚Äôm updating my review. I have a WeightGURUS scale that I purchased which is wonderful. It used to sync with my fitnesspal now it‚Äôs not even one of the scales that my fitnespal shows. Please add it back. Even WeightGURUS stated it‚Äôs, my fitness pal, been corrupted for me to delete my fitness pal and re-add it. Which I did and WeightGURUS still has not shown up. Please add it back to your assessable apps. Once that is completed I will add five stars but right now I‚Äôm very dissatisfied.
Great app! First, this is a genuine review.

Food tracking is Great! Exercise not so much. I like this app a lot for food calorie tracking, but I wish it did as good a job with the exercise tracking. The database is very limited, and it‚Äôs frustrating not finding my exercises in there and having to then try to do manual calculations elsewhere to enter into MFP.

For Keto Users! Love the app, super functional and makes the intimidating task of tracking macros more accessible to the layman, like me!  Only request, please add a function to calculate net carbs for us keto users! Almost had a hard attack when I added one meal and thought I had hit my carb limit for the day. Please and thank you!

Battery drain I use the app pretty much every day to track and look up foods, so it‚Äôs great in those aspects. My biggest complaint would be that the app, when open, drains my battery extremely fast. I can also feel my phone heating up. Maybe optimize / downsize it?

McDonald This app is helping me so much. I‚Äôm not a healthy eater & I don‚Äôt eat 3 meals a day, mostly just lunch. I love that it reminds me of choices, counts calories for me & gives me credit if I happen to walk a lot. I love the chart and nutrient info. It is my constant and I‚Äôm so glad I found the app.

Decent but needs to talk to FitBit The sync between MyFitnessPal and Fitbit is shoddy despite the two apps promoting that they are comparable. I‚Äôm experiencing syncing problems on both ends. I like how user friendly MyFitnessPal is in terms of tracking food and calories but the Exercise tracking and syncing with FitBit leaves a lot to be desired.

Add multiple snack options! I love this app I just have one suggestion: add three different snack options instead of just the one, like snack breakfast, snack lunch, snack dinner. This could be used for people who are bulking, have weird eating schedules, pregnant people, etc. Just a thought!

Ads are awful I have an IPhone 6s and this app is great, however I can‚Äôt open it anymore without the ads causing me to lose 20% of my battery whenever I want go add a meal. I know I could pay for premium, but if I did I would like it to be because I wanted the locked features or something, not because its killing my phone. After 5 years of usage I am switching to MyPlate. Optimize your ads.

Ekmsunshine I really like this App when I used it with my Fitbit. But now that I‚Äôve graduated to an Apple Watch it won‚Äôt play nicely. It will not log my steps to be taken into account in my total calorie intake/ output.   I‚Äôve followed all the directions online as well as on the app but it still won‚Äôt sink my steps.   I guess I‚Äôll have to find another more compatible app for calorie tracking.  I‚Äôm glad I hadn‚Äôt paid for this.

Rip off I hate that I got charged $50 for an annual subscription for absolutely zero added value‚Ä¶ Not to mention that the charge made me overdraft so I actually got charge $85 for ZERO added value. I tried to get the charge reversed, but the App Store made it clear that was not going to happen. Not to mention that it for some reason no longer tracks my steps even though it says it is connected to my iPhone step tracker. I am an incredibly dissatisfied customer.

App changes My fitness pal continues to change. When I finally become familiar with where things are located they move in a new update. This makes it more time-consuming and difficult to keep on track. And hard to enjoy using the app.
Fixing bugs takes long. Overall great app Great app but fixing bugs took longer than expected, 4 days to be exact. Messed up a whole weeks worth of logging but glad it‚Äôs back to normal.

It crashes CONSTANTLY The app it‚Äôs self is great.. when it works. Which is rarely. It‚Äôs a popular enough app you‚Äôd think they‚Äôd work out all the bugs but it‚Äôs always the same. Trouble accessing your friends profiles. Randomly loses your weight losses. Randomly changes your activity rate so your calories jump up and down randomly. SO annoying.

No I will not turn on location services The app has started prompting me to give it access to my location every single time I open the app so that Under Armour can provide me with ‚Äúpersonalized experiences‚Äù AKA targeted ads. No thanks. I‚Äôm never going to turn it on, but there is no way to turn off this annoying notification for good, so I‚Äôm forced to say no to it multiple times a day. Bad design and bad user experience. The app cares about ads, not users.

Not very user friendly for non techy people. Struggling to find your app to be simple at all. It is very difficult to add something and if you do it easily seems to go on the wrong day and unfortunately I cannot figure out how to get on the correct day to add in my meals.
Food Tracking I‚Äôm Learning a lot about my food habits
Very useful for diet tracking This app stores your favorite foods, which makes entries faster and easier.  It offers a large selection of standard food with their calorie count.
Last update issue I really like this app. Up until the last update it was nearly flawless. However, it has stopped synching steps with my iPhone 6+ running iOS 12.3. No issues prior to this update.

Great tool This app has been a great tool to guide and keep track of my weight loss journey. It helped simplify the burden of eating healthy. Also i subscribed to the full version and I have found the articles very informative. They are very good about answering a lot of FAQ regarding neatly eating.

Buggy, horrible I have been faithfully logging for well over 400 days, which is great and I loved it. Until today. For some reason (I already know the reason) I cant log in or access my account anywhere. Hmmm. Wonder if that‚Äôs because they are purposely trying to force people to buy the paid service? Well, you‚Äôve lost a customer, not only for this but also for Under Armor. And you‚Äôve bought yourself a lot of free bad advertising.

So much potential Without paying for the premium version of this app, there is still a lot that is offered here. Overall decent system aside from the fact that there is NO WAY TO ADD FAVORITE FOODS. The ‚Äúrecent‚Äù and ‚Äúfrequent‚Äù tabs that MyFitnessPal lists automatically simply do not cut it. There needs to be a way for users to favorite a food so that they have a list of the foods they eat. It is a hassle to scroll through or search for the same foods all the time!!

Can‚Äôt even create an account I recently downloaded the app and have tried to make an account about 13 times. Every time I hit continue after the questions about age and location, a pop-up shows up saying that creating an account ‚Äúcould not be completed at this time.‚Äù I‚Äôm very close to giving up with this app, but I‚Äôll give the developers the benefit of the doubt and assume that the most recent update was just wonky.

Amazing I‚Äôve had this app for a little over a year now and it has helped me a lot with keeping me in track with my eating habits. With this app I have lost +30 lbs by tracking my macros and calories. It is simple and one of my favorite apps.

It stops working every time The app is amazing but it stops working suddenly EVERY TIME! It‚Äôs like the screen is locked, than I have to close and open the app again but after 1min it happens again. I‚Äôve deleted and reinstalled the app but the problem persists. It‚Äôs very annoying having to close and open the app every time.

There are lots of errors on the app!! I had this app on my phone and recently I had lots of errors that it went to Offline Mode (even though I‚Äôm connected to the internet on both WiFi and my phone internet) and I kept getting these syncing errors. I can‚Äôt log in to my account in the app. I even reset my password and I STILL can‚Äôt get my account in the app.

Deteriorating stability I‚Äôve used this app for several years and generally been pleased with the quality. However, over the last few months, the app has begun crashing several times a day, usually when I‚Äôm trying to enter food into the diary.  At times it feels unusable. I‚Äôm hopeful that the dev team will respond to my bug report and address the issue quickly.

Add net carbs as a feature people have been asking for since 2015 Please add net carbs as a feature to track people have been asking to have this feature added for years. And we all get the same response from ‚ÄúDwight‚Äù. Well Fwight if I wanted to calculate something myself I wouldn‚Äôt have paid for the premium version and taken down ‚Äúnotes‚Äù myself as you suggested... please add this function! So people on Keto can see that they are actually eating enough Veggies!!

Frustrating!!! After logging in for 25 days straight and losing 15 pounds.....now the app doesn‚Äôt want to open at all anymore. I‚Äôve updated the app, shut down, and restarted my phone twice. Still no luck! üò°üò°üò°

Good but.. One of the easiest ways to track your calories. The fact you can scan bar codes and it has most of the popular restaurants I go to has hands down made it the reason why I stick with it. Though it has some spotty maintenance and bugs that can leave it down for days at a time.

Good I love this app, and use daily, and it helps me from over eating/snacking all day. It has apps where you can connect you fitness watch, but its super annoying because the device I use isnt any of those. I have an app called 3plus elite, and it would be great if you added it to your list.

Having trouble in the app I‚Äôve used this years ago and had great success with my goals. Redownloaded recently but having trouble do a general food search within the app. Online I can search any food but on the app I can only search within recent used. Help?!

Honestly Great Im a younger guy soy results are sure to be skewed but I lost ten pounds in about a month and a half by using this app. It also helps inform you about your nutrient consumption not just calories. Super effective app, and one that I would definitely use again.

Amazingly Helpful App I have tried several apps to track my fitness, food, and the nutritional content and this app is by far the best one.. love it I love being able to export my info and take to my dietician and doctor.. and it works my fitbit. üëèüèæ

Great App! This tool works and it‚Äôs easy to use. It‚Äôs more than just a food tracker, but just tracking your food and staying within your limits will help you shed the pounds. I highly recommend it to anyone who wants start leading a healthier lifestyle.

I‚Äôve lost over 60 lbs ! Thanks to my fitness pal and the support of my weight loss doctor I have managed to loose 60lbs so far. By far the best app for managing food intake etc. I went from 276lbs down to 210 in about 8 months. Thanks my fitness pal ! UPDATE- I have now lost a TOTAL of 102 POUNDS!!!!! Best app ever ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

Fitbit Sync What would make this a five star rating is to fix the constant sync issues with Fitbit. I rely on my Fitbit activity for calorie intake but it seems to be broken frequently. My Fitbit syncs fine with other apps so I am assuming the error is within MyFitnessPal. Other than that I love the ease of tracking!

Great app overall Only thing is that it‚Äôs been crashing a lot with the new update. Not sure if anyone else has been having this problem. Also it would be nice to be able to enter specific ingredients to foods (vitamins, etc), expanding the standard list.
Only looks good. Actually does nothing. Will register calorie input from expresso fitness bikes. Does not keep cumulative records. Does not log miles.  Calories listed is not properly converted.

One thing.... this app is great I use it everyday...expect this one thing keeps happening. It randomly logs me out of my account and usually I just log back in and it‚Äôs fine BUT it‚Äôs now saying there is an error with logging in and it keeps failing. Please fix this as soon as you can. Thanks.

It‚Äôs okay The free version of the app is okay. Some foods don‚Äôt pop up so it makes it difficult to enter even with the barcode. It‚Äôs also hard to find your macros for the day if they were in a more accessible spot instead of clicking on 2-3 different things before finding it that would be nice but overall it‚Äôs a good app.

Review of my fitness pal app The app can be a little confusing at times. Also, I‚Äôm visually impaired and use voice over on my iPhone. The app is not always completely accessible with voiceover. There are ways to make apps fully accessible. Wish my fitness pal would look into this. If it weren‚Äôt for the accessibility issue, I would have rated the app hire.

Great app needs updating The app allows for creating your own meals and dividing per serving. When adding that meal to breakfast lunch or dinner it never tells you the name of the meal in the daily menus. It just lists the ingredients This can get confusing over time.

Great for being Free As I have started this new journey I have been grateful to have the app to help track and motivate. I wish it was easier to do meal prep count. I do a bunch of meal preps in Sunday with bulk ingredients and I struggle knowing what to put down as what each meal equates to after cooking all of the ingredients together and storing for the week.

Great App! I love this app! It has so many foods to choose from that I almost always find what I need. Tracks exercise, water intake - overall so very helpful in keeping me on track to eat better and lose weight. The nutrient breakdown is fantastic. You can see exactly what you need more/less of.

overrated, non-intuitive interface Been using MyNetDiary for a couple of years. Thought I‚Äôd try this because of high ratings. On the first morning I attempted to enter ‚Äúegg‚Äù, the scanner came up with ‚Äúeggwhite‚Äù when I tried to enter it manually ‚Äúegg‚Äù was not in the database. Eggwhite was. Eggnog was. But not egg. I can accept a mix-up in a barcode reading, but not having ‚Äúegg‚Äù in the database? Inexcusable. No Help available in app, and no way to contact developer. Too bad, App sounded great on paper, but it‚Äôs back to MyNetDiary.
Tracking I‚Äôve tried using this several times before but I get it now. It‚Äôs a wonderful tool if you‚Äôre serious about a life change in both weight loss and healthy living!

Leave my apples alone Good app for tracking calorie intake. Does require some savvyness on the part of the user to navigate inaccurate user-submitted listings, to weigh or measure one‚Äôs own portions, etc. Least favorite feature: MFP sends obnoxious warnings about my daily sugar limit every time I log an apple. Leave my apples alone! üçé

I love this app! I‚Äôve been using this app for years. Very straightforward and can be used in a variety of ways. This app is so easy to use. The food data base and the barcode scanner are amazing. It's a good fit for someone who has a busy schedule!

Buggy as always I used this app like years ago and it‚Äôs just as glitchy as it was before.  Won‚Äôt let me put in any food info.. tried making a new account and it says ‚Äútry again later‚Äù frustrating and annoying!

Lost 55 lbs thanks to this app Super easy to use, and if there aren‚Äôt a already certain foods or recipes in the database it‚Äôs easy to add. I‚Äôve lost 55 pounds with this app and I‚Äôm maintaining my weight still using this app. It taught me how to control my portions and make smart choices.
Love having this app! It helps me to log everything in here! They also have helpful articles. I like being able to link with friends that are

Finally filling in the blanks I‚Äôve been way of using the guessing game when it comes to meal planning and hitting my macros.  Like way off.  Thanks to this app, I‚Äôve dialed in and fine tuned a diet plan that‚Äôs fail proof.  I love that I can scan everything too.  Even my vitamins üò±

iOS update Apple updated to iOS 11 and your app is not working properly, can‚Äôt change serving size. Scan items and MFP comes up with a completely different item or shows the macros completely different than what is on the packaging. Yet you keep asking me to upgrade to premium and pay, don‚Äôt think so

author_name: This is such a stupid app!!!!!
review_body: Please add an option to display net carbs I love pretty much everything about this app except that it only shows total carbs and not net carbs. I am tracking my carbs and it‚Äôs harder when there‚Äôs no option for net carbs. It would be great if you added a setting option for that.
Tap Your Way to success!! This App makes it easy to record all of your Goals, exercise and nutrition.

Lost data. Had been continuously logged in and using the app daily for 7 months. I started the app yesterday and had to login: to my surprise all my logs, data, everything was gone. Very frustrating since I had Ben going thru a protocol to reverse Diabetes.

Helps with losing weight Just monitoring calories and knowing how many are in different kinds of food I eat helps a lot to keep below daily goals. Even if I'm not constantly using, I know which foods are better to be eating.

7 day trial of paid version, please! Love the app!!! Have used it for years - ups and downs.  Wish that they would do a free trial for 7 days of the fancy upgrade.  Don't know if I would want to commit to the upgrade if I don't test out the features first!

New Monthly Fee Ruined It. I used this app a few years ago and it was super helpful in executing a macro based diet (about all I used it for). Really easy to save frequently consumed combos, easy to find nutrition data, etc. it was Golden!!

Good but not worth $50 Great for logging daily eating habits and macro-nutrient goals, but the free version lacks a little bit too much compared to the paid version. The payed version is not quite worth the 50 dollars a year, but I still think they should give the free users a bit more analytical tools.
Great app with extremely dated design The application is great for food tracking but there are a few issues with it

Great training partner I've struggled keeping track of my diet (intake) to insure my calories and macro nutrients are aligned with my fueling plan. Over the years, I've used multiple apps and methods.  This app, by far, is the easiest to use and most comprehensive that I've found.
Shame on these creators You have to put up with junk food ads unless you pay too much money for a subscription.  This app peaked and is on the decline.

Notifications are a lie, but great I get a notification everyday saying that I didn‚Äôt log my lunch, breakfast, etc. But I always do. That‚Äôs the most annoying part of the app. But love all the extras they offer like articles and recipes! Definitely helps keep my nutritional goals on track

Great app but can be greater! I always wanted to ‚Äúshare‚Äù my diary with non-users through imessage. This way they can see the diary of what I ate, drink, and did that day. I hope MyFitnessPal creates this function so non-users are able to see and use the app!!

Net carbs? I really like this app but as someone who likes to track carb consumption it is frustrating to not be able to just see net carbs represented. I have to subtract my fiber from carbs. It‚Äôs not overwhelmingly difficult but it would be nice to have a setting to just track net carbs by default instead of total carbs.

Need to fix bug from most recent update I‚Äôve been using My Fitness pal for about a year and a half now.  It‚Äôs great to keep track of calories spent and consumed.  Was working fine until most recent update, as when logging meals now, app crashes repeatedly.

Great app, but keeps crashing after today‚Äôs update You will enjoy this app - straight forward and accurate. It takes a lot of the fuss and ‚Äòthinking‚Äô out of making better dining choices. Im certain that the crashing thing will be fixed promptly.

Great app I love this app, and counting macros is easy- but I wish there was a way to check off the food you eat during the day. I plan my meals for the day the night before and it would be nice to check things off when you e eaten them so it‚Äôs easier to see what‚Äôs left to eat.

Better than the others I‚Äôve used myfitness pal for a few years now. I‚Äôve tried other apps a couple times, thinking I might be motivated by something new. I always come back to myfitness pal. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Bad user experience I‚Äôm sure if you buy all your food from the store that has a barcode this could be a great app. But for those of us that make healthy food from scratch and juice this thing is a train wreck. Super hard to use super user unfriendly if you can‚Äôt scan a barcode it‚Äôs a waste of time. I‚Äôve been a product owner and an engineer for more than one software company and I can‚Äôt believe this thing has the ratings it has. This is a horrible app

Love it So convenient! Great tool however the app ‚Äúfroze up‚Äù on my apple phone was told to deinstalled and reinstall can‚Äôt get reinstalled on my phone although my password works fine on my pc can‚Äôt  log on here even after signing up for premium can‚Äôt get ahold of a human tech support!
Fix Weekly Digest access App is great and easy to use. A lot of products are in the database. You can create meals so you log food quicker.

Great app but has some bugs The only thing about this app that I don‚Äôt like is that it is never able to import my recipes. I‚Äôll spend all this time typing in the ingredients but then I get an error message saying ‚Äúunable to sync recipe‚Äù. Very annoying for someone that cooks a lot.

Highly Recommend I absolutely love this app. It has helped me so much in losing weight. It‚Äôs easy to use and really keeps me accountable both in food intake and exercise. Highly recommend for anyone wanting to lose weight.

Changed my outlook on food Provided a weight loss goal and it‚Äôs scanning ability and food database is superb in helping keep up with calories. The exercises and the suggestions it provides are awesome. This app has been indispensable in my weight loss journey.

Works well, even the free version Scanning the UPC codes on food packaging works almost every time. It has a large data base of restaurant meals and will send you a reminder if you forget to input a meal. Syncs with the step counter on iPhone as well.

Having issues... The app won‚Äôt actually submit my daily diary (for past four days!) and it seems to be very glitchy when it comes to actually syncing with the server and other apps.  Sad that this is happening right after I paid for premium, as it was great before this last week.
Love this app! Very user friendly. Only thing is I wish it were a little easier to find the same did you've eaten previously. They don't always seem to come up in the list of recent foods.

author_name: D o n a l d
review_body: Good app but annoying problem On my iPad I have to re login every day, why is that? It does not happen on my iPhone. I have restarted, uninstalled/reinstalled the app with no luck. Please fix this or advise how to stop this behavior. I have used this app for years and never had this problem until the last few months or so. Thanks.

Was Great, Not Anymore Was fantastic for tracking calories and macros. Now it won‚Äôt let me search for any food not in my frequently used tab. It keeps saying ‚Äúoffline mode‚Äù every time I try to search food. I‚Äôve tried restarting it multiple times, logging out and back in, disabling and reenabling internet connection. Nothing seems to fix it. It‚Äôs basically useless without being able to search for food items to add.

Offline mode I used to use this app religiously a few years back. Came back to it to help with a cut but no matter the internet I'm connected to, my LTE, or anything, I am unable to search or add anything. It keeps going into ‚Äúoffline mode‚Äù I have yet to be allowed to enter any new foods. My only options I‚Äôm left with are the old food I used to eat that were recorded in the offline mode. Extremely frustrating. I never had this issue before.
Great app but freezing lots now I‚Äôve lost 55 lbs using this app...it‚Äôs been my buddy for a while now.

Network issues with the app I‚Äôd give this more stars but the last couple of days I‚Äôve had network errors when I try to upload a recipe. This is my favorite part of the app and it‚Äôs frustrating that it isn‚Äôt working. Hope someone resolves this issue soon or I‚Äôll have to switch to a different app.

Good functionality - poor interface There is a lot of functionality but the interface is a bit of a jumbled mess. The way you create meals and add them to days, the way you view your macro totals is very clunky

Crashes in seconds This application fails every time it opens. That‚Äôs the only constant, it‚Äôs crashing. A meal can take up to 30 minutes to enter. After months, I‚Äôve simply gotten very good at my diet and realized I don‚Äôt need the app. It‚Äôs a shame because I honestly enjoyed it, but I don‚Äôt enjoy turning my iPhone off and on every time I add another part of my meal. Sometimes I‚Äôve had to reboot my phone up to six times for one meal. It‚Äôs aggravating in an unhealthy way.

App is crashing constantly I love this app and its ability to help me keep track of my food intake and weight management.  However, as of late, the app allows me to use it for 20-60 seconds before it randomly closes.  If I‚Äôm in the middle of logging a food, I have to start over.  This app was just updated yesterday and it is still a problem.  I hope this is fixed soon.

Fitbit syncing for this app and step calorie counts inflated Having been using this app for years and added Fitbit steps sync function  1 year ago.  Works well for awhile then doesn‚Äôt. Seems like every time they issue an update on this app there are problems with Fitbit steps

So very happy I have been using this apt. For awhile, but in this last year I have been taking it seriously and I have lost over 70lbs in 7 months and I could not have done it without the help of my fitness pal. Thank you

Outstanding! Anyone can loose 10-15 lbs if you truthfully log in your food and want to eat a little better. This app educates you to the results of what you put in your body. Try it and then you‚Äôll better understand.

Impressed App is pretty cool. Similar to other apps in some ways- keeping track of steps, foods etc except it is much better at recognizing foods and the scan feature is great. Over all I think it‚Äôs the best fitness app I‚Äôve used.

App The app is a great way to track. Never realized the items I usually would eat are all wrong for my level of activity (desk job). The one con-charging for the full app, single,low income people can't afford yet another bill.
Weight Loss Assistant This is a great app for keeping track of weight, nutrition, and exercise.

Losing Weight! This app has helped me lose weight!  It takes some time getting used to logging your meals, but now I look forward to it. So excited to see the pounds continue to drop. This app keeps me on target.

Lots of crashing lately. This app is great, but lately it‚Äôs not working right. Sometimes it‚Äôs super slow, sometimes it crashes, at times it hesitated and freezes. Please fix it soon! I depend on this app for my daily calories. I need it to work properly! Thank you!

No longer letting me log ANYTHING Loved this app, but can't give it high ratings since today I upgraded to Premium Membership and now, oddly, the app doesn't work. Keeps closing when I try to log food, exercise, etc. Not sure if the developers read these, but there's a glitch somewhere. Will have to move to a different app to keep myself on track until this gets fixed.

Audio ads play randomly I like this app a lot for its intended purpose however whenever I have it open random political audio ads start to play. In the forum I see that this was a problem back into thousand 15, I‚Äôve tried the suggested remedy but it continues to happen. Please help!

Alright by itself but can‚Äôt sync other apps The app is alright by itself but it has the option to sync other apps to it and I have been trying for a half hour now to do that and it is t syncing. This upsets me because if it would sync I would have to put all the information into more than one app.

Best apps I love fitness pal they provide lots and lots of information abt health its easy to use..I like everything abt fitness pal..one thing i dont like is the high premiums..I know nothing is free in this world its just my point of view..But i still appreciate what they have done..üëèüëèüëè

Non-barcode items My only wish is that when entering a new food that doesn't have a barcode I could just type in Roma tomato and all the nutrition facts would pop up. Otherwise I have to manually enter them which takes forever!!

I hate dieting but I love this app! Started doing a low carb/low calorie diet. With the help of this app, I'm able to keep track of my meals and stick to my food plan. So much easier because all I do is search for the food and the info is there!

Quite helpful I love the community aspect of this app and the macro tracking. Simple to use, convenient and FREE at the basic level. Can't beat that! This has basically replaced fb and taught me sooo much about health and fitness, as well as helped me lose weight :)

Very Helpful I use MFP along with Garmin Connect. It's very helpful. If I'm unable to run, and check my calories, it's very informative and shocking sometimes. You don't always realize your calories can seriously add up quicker than you think.

Used to work great. Now it crashes I used this app in the past and really liked it. I started using it again and it crashes constantly. Just having it open, doing nothing else on my phone and it crashes.

Works as purposes Been using it for 10 days.  Has a few crashes here and there, a few foods that aren‚Äôt nutritionally correct but overall fit for purpose for my weight loss and food diary goals.  Recommend it to those starting out!

Nutrition watcher The app is very user friendly. I only wish it would require all fields to be filled in when someone is creating a food that's not in data base. Some of us don't just watch calories but other nutritional facts as well. A lot of foods are calories only in the data base.

Easy to use and I see results! It has restaurant menus for easy food entry. Scan barcode makes my life easier. I like that it tells you when to weigh yourself, and shows you how many nutrients you got for the day.
Very helpful for weight/fitness app I use the app to track my meals and daily calories. I recently added my exercises (which is a bit limited if you‚Äôre not using the premium version).

Helping with weight loss! This app is really easy to use and shows you very quickly which foods you eat are high in calories and more importantly sodium and other hidden items. This has helped me a lot!

It‚Äôs glitching!! I‚Äôve been using this app for years and I love it. But it‚Äôs been really frustrating lately. I have to keep closing and re opening the app because for some reason it won‚Äôt let me search and add my meals until I reopen the app for the 10th time. I don‚Äôt wanna delete this useful app but I might have to if this isn‚Äôt fixed üòï.

Scan button I think the scan button is a bit small and when it is at the bottom right of the screen when creating recipes it is hard to press sometimes with my iPhone 11.. it could be a lot bigger and the problem would be solved...

Amazing for the most part! I love that it incorporates workouts into calories allotted. If I don‚Äôt eat enough per myfitness pal it won‚Äôt let me close my diary. Also it sends reminders saying I haven‚Äôt input my breakfast or lunch. When I have?

App shuts down by itself I have been using this app for years and since the last update I can no longer count my carbs, protein and fat when I quick add my recipe or food. I now can only do it if I purchase the premium plan. Along with turning off in the middle of logging food or making a recipe and making me re-enter all the information I have moved my 4 star rating to a 2.
Love the app and wanted to add a suggestion I love the app, it comes me accountable and I‚Äôve already am noticing results. üòÄ

So effective in tracking progress! MyFitnessPal is an incredible resource!! As a trainer, I‚Äôm always trying to help clients find a healthy, efficient & positive way to achieve their goals. I always recommend they use it. The food/nutrition breakdown is huge!

Avid user I don‚Äôt know what I would do without My Fitness Pal. I am on a strict nutritional diet for my health and must track everything I eat. This program makes it so much easier. The extra self help programs are also helpful. I love it.

Over 50 with heart disease Great app! Makes me aware of what the nutritional value of my food choices, allows me to make better choices, lost 17 lbs in 2 months, steady slow weight loss is the way to change habits and keep weight off

Best Nutritional Database, buggy app This is the best app for calorie counting on the market, and that‚Äôs kind of sad. I regularly encounter bugs like entries being duplicated 10-20 times when I enter them, recipes not saving, and copying meals ending up on a different date than I entered. Also, the latency is often so bad that the app is unusable. I use this app every day but I wish it could fix the constant performance issues.

Wish goal plans were part of the upgrade App is a great tool for anyone trying to watch their weight or eat healthy. Food is medicine- this tool helps me understand what goes in my body. Wish plans were part of free app.

I like the App I'm glad there is another option to add the things I eat, see how many calories are left, and to be able to scan foods. I wish there was a place on here to keep pictures of the meals that I ate. I feel lucky to have found Myfitnesspal so thank you!

Won‚Äôt connect to Fitbit! My steps and exercise are not being logged.  I tried to fix online via desktop as well without any luck.  App keeps saying that the interface isn‚Äôt connecting or something of the like...so frustrating!

What happened I recently started using this app again because it was so helpful in weight loss tracking. But now I can‚Äôt look up food from all place or options from other people. An it does not convert my walking (Pacer app) calories into my equation any more. I really appreciated that additional help.. Is this all premium now???
Do not get this! No way to get to a place on this app to Cancel. I even tried to find it through the third party it ‚Äúseems‚Äù it came through...UnderArmor.

Please Add A NetCarb Counter! This app is pretty great and convenient overall. However, if you‚Äôre doing keto, you need a 2nd app to count your net carbs. It‚Äôs frustrating and time consuming to have to go between and keep track of everything. If they would add net carbs to the nutrition plan, I would give it 5 stars.

Used to be a great app however..... Used to love this app. However for some reason months ago app stopped syncing with Fitbit. Have sent multiple messages to tech support to receive no replies. Have researched ways to resolve and still no success. Very frustrating. Enough to not make me use the app any longer. Very Disappointing.

Used to be a great app Sadly Under Armour has ruined one of the best fitness and food tracking apps. I cannot stand the constant badgering to upgrade to premium. Ads are all over the place. The home screen is cluttered with blog entries that I have zero interest in.

Fix this! So I have a problem were I can‚Äôt even create an account. At some point in the sign up a notification pops up which says ‚ÄúALERT sorry, we are unable to process your registration at this time‚Äù I‚Äôve tried deleting the app and swiping it out but still the notification keeps coming up. I‚Äôve read the other reviews and they make this app sound great and I would really like it if I could  actually use it.

Updates never are updates It works great until they update it. Then they have to fix the updates that messed up fixing the‚Äùbugs‚Äù. It says it works with Fitbit but 7 times out of 10, do they connect. No. It is eating my battery and killing my Fitbit. I use the premium. I pay good money for this app. I get so frustrated...it‚Äôs not worth it üò¨üòèAsked for update to my review. Status...the same.

Prairie girl The last 2 upgrades have been a mess.  I can‚Äôt add my exercise as it deletes everything I‚Äôve entered.  Then I wanted to add another exercise & it said it was entered, but it‚Äôs nowhere to be found.

Great App, When it Works I‚Äôve had the app for 3 days and today it will not log me in...I even tried logging into the website‚Äîgetting error messages for both methods. What going on??? I do like the nutrition macros it tracks, and ease of the user interface. I‚Äôd really like to use this product please fix this server/log in issue.

Where would I be without MyFitnessPal?!? New, improved attitude toward food, data that tells the story of success, great articles to help keep you on the straight and narrow have led to 60+ lbs loss. Can‚Äôt thank you enough for walking with me on this journey.

Ap worked great... until it stopped syncing Ap now acts as if you are not connected with the internet (even if you are). I made the mistake of logging out and then deleting the Ap and redownloading it and trying to log back in. I can no longer get in the Ap at all, I can‚Äôt even create a new account. Obvious software issue that needs to be fixed immediately, otherwise the Ap is useless to any new users. Very frustrating. Please fix!

Advertisers on this app.. hear this! This used to be the best diet app out there. I will intentionally go out of my way to NOT patronize your enterprise if you advertise on MyFitnessPal. The developers are taking advantage of users and the incessant pop-ups have ruined a perfectly good app that many people have used for years. I‚Äôd almost consider going Premium to avoid the pop-ups that degrade the USA ability, but at $50 per year up front or $10 per month the price is ridiculous.

Glitching I was starting to enjoy using this app but it has started to glitch horribly since the last two updates. I can barely scan food without an error message popping up and it does not always transfer my steps from my daily walks. Please fix these bugs immediately so that I can continue to enjoy the app and track my fitness/food goals.

Lifesaving app Don‚Äôt understand the nitpicky negative reviews to be honest. This app is a godsend rich with nutritional data. I‚Äôve lost 19 pounds in the last 2 months using myfitnesspal. Weight loss is all calories. Makes weight loss too easy.  I‚Äôm addicted. Thank you!

Failed to Sync I have been using this app for years and have managed my weight. I would definitely recommend it however I am getting really fed up with every time I open the app, I get a failed to sync message. This is not a new app and it has been going on for a long time and should be fixed by now.  smh

Iffy I have been using MyFitnessPal for years but lately it‚Äôs been unpredictable as to whether it will correctly calculate my end of the day calories. I have had several days when I‚Äôm under my goal calories and have exercised for it to only calculate me as being over. I hate the uncertainty of this ‚Äúnew and improved‚Äù version and definitely wouldn‚Äôt upgrade for more unpredictability. üòï

Great Tracking App I love this app but gave it 4 out 5 stars. Why? It needs more polish and perhaps input from its users. I would like to see a better design around the concept of a recipe and a meal. Conceptually these are similar and should be able to switch from one to the other.

Great tool for health and fitness Easily keep up with calories and macros.  Works with fitness trackers to motivate your exercise and diet plans.  Seeing the info from every meal and activity is the key for me.  So much better than similar apps I have tried!!

Needs More Micronutrients It works really well for macronutrients, but I really wish it would include more micronutrients. It has the capability of scanning the barcode for the nutrition label so I don‚Äôt understand why it doesn‚Äôt already just have everything. I‚Äôd give it 5 stars if it weren‚Äôt for that.

Great database The food database is pretty big and I rarely find something not in it. I also like being able to scan foods into the app. It syncs automatically with your fitness devices, which is also great.

great app I love the app. SO GREAT. Just having issues with my iPhone X trying to save ‚Äú my meal‚Äù. Idk if the save button is to close to the batery/control center slide down but the back button and save button DO NOT work when I try and save a created meal

Syncing issues This app never syncs with my Fitbit well. It‚Äôs very annoying. It works well for a few days then it just stops recognizing it. And I have deleted and unconnected to try and rectify the problem and nothing.

Why doesn‚Äôt MFP sync with Fitbit anymore I‚Äôve used MFP for over 6 years. It‚Äôs been very helpful to me losing and now maintaining my weight. In the last free weeks it‚Äôs stopped syncing with my fitbit app and it‚Äôs caused me to have to doubling document everything daily in order to have my exercise and diet intake accurate. If you can fix this I‚Äôd rate MFP 5 stars again. Thanks!

Constant errors, unable to import recipes I just paid to upgrade and the app is so buggy and glitchy that I can hardly use it. Will not import recipes. Get a pop up error each time I try from a URL look-up. Still getting an onslaught of advertisements. Home page full of terrible articles from under armpit that I‚Äôm not interested in. I‚Äôm on keto and this app while counting macros is not an easy keto user app. Super disappointing. Will be asking for refund.

App slowing down I have been using this app for over a year now and it has started slowing down. It is in need of a update because it constantly closes out or moves very slow. Dieting and having to be very patient with an app to log your food leads to eating a brownie. Pretty please update the app. Also, this app rocks in every other way! Thanks!

Decent Because I‚Äôve logged in this app for so long already, I‚Äôve decided to stick with it. That being said, I‚Äôm continually unable to sync my step count to my calorie adjustment despite multiple attempts to sync the app with my health app and continuous updates. It won‚Äôt even sync to another UA app I use. It‚Äôs bordering garbage but I‚Äôm already too deep into using it.

User friendly Awesome app for tracking everything.  I especially love the scanner to quickly identify food items.  The first day using the app, following a low carb diet and staying within my daily calorie count, I lost 2 lbsüòÅ

Logging in I usually don‚Äôt need to log in every day or during the day but I was asked after using app earlier today. I tried to log in and even changed log in password but still no log in. I keep getting a message that says ‚Äúwe were unable to connect to the server to log you in‚Äù. Help.

Suggestions I love using the app. I wish I could scan my ingredients in for my recipes from the bar codes it would make it easier to stay on track with family recipes I modify Alford a healthy version.  Also if I could track my steps so that I can see my progress...they disappear at the end of each day.

Not reliable I like that they have menus of many restaurants and that they have so many foods into the data banks but the intake I log in never seems correct a day or so later. I don't understand it. I log 1600 calories on Tuesday and the following day or so, somehow it comes up to say 965 calories. I don't get it. I use this app in conjunction with my Garmin 935

My fitness pal Doesn‚Äôt seem to want to sync to my Blaze.  This has been problematic.  I think it‚Äôs more about under Armor wanting more people buying their products, which I will never do, as long as they support the NFL.

Really useful app!! This app is great!  I use it to track food , check calories counts for dining at home and in many, many restaurants. The exercise info is often useful for me and I‚Äôve found many tasty and healthy recipes with it.

Some features don‚Äôt work well When I look for a specific restaurant, by name, I expect to see if at the top of the search list, not have to scroll through 20 names and still not find it. I know it‚Äôs there; it‚Äôs been found before. Creating recipes is burdensome. How can a data base not find white flour? And the feature is even more broken now because after each character I enter, the keyboard goes away. Every character.

Instruction not helpful Hard to diagnose why the app does not work on my iPhone. Instructions for correcting specific issues are too general or non-existent.  Looks like it might be a good app but it is not worth the aggravation if it doesn‚Äôt work after multiple attempts. I even had another user of this app try to figure out why it won‚Äôt work on my phone. Some bugs are persistent, I guess.

Loved this app until: I loved this app until it stopped updating my exercise constantly. I loss and maintain my weight best when I have to accountable. In this case it was My Fitness  Pal. Now I‚Äôm just getting frustrated with the software. Very discouragedüòü

Sooo easy to use. I love this app so much. It helps me to track my calories. It's so easy to go over the daily limit and you don't even realize it until you track. This app makes it incredibly fast & simple.

Everything you need! This app has helped me keep in check what I am eating and helps me say no when I‚Äôm close to my calorie intake for the day. It also combines all my fitness apps in one. Love the new progress photo option too!

Couldn‚Äôt even make an account So I want to be healthier, and decided to get my fitness pal because I heard about it and it seemed like a great idea. I tried to create an account, but it wouldn‚Äôt let me, and I am assuming it is because I was born in 2005, though the age rating is 4+, implying that a 5 year old could use it based on the rating, but actually couldn‚Äôt. I‚Äôm leaving 2 stars because it looks like a good app
Good tool for keeping track of your intake Easy to use and has a great variety of food already. It also gives you the opportunity to enter anything that isn't already there.

Very Useful Finally a tool that helps me track my progress easily. Only confusion right now is that the formula for calorie consumption. Allowed minus consumed equals available. But credit for calories reduces remaining calories even more? I'll figure it out.

Great app (except for pregnant and nursing mothers) There wasn't a way to accurately track calories for a 1 pound weight gain per week when I was pregnant. I also cannot input the burning of calories for breastfeeding each day, and these would be huge improvements to the app! Adjust the calories for pregnant and new moms!

Calories measurements very approximative When you enter food, you usually find what you eat but i think the program uses people‚Äôs input so there is a lot of guessing. It gives you an idea of how many calories you ate but it is really an educated guess.

Great but missing one thing It‚Äôs a great app and even the free versione rally  helps with your fitness goals. I only wish there was a way for premium members to be able to generate a shopping list based on the recipes they choose in the app.

Registration error I would love to rate this app way better than what i have but i cant do that because i cant even experience it, It doesn't let me register I've updated my phone and uninstalled and reinstalled about 5 times i even went to the website and it didn't work please fix this app looks great and please don't just respond and send me the same thing that you have sent everyone else that has sent a bad review.
Very helpful website This website gives you all the tools you can need to improve your health by keeping track of your exercise and food choices.

I hate this update As of this last update, the app defaults to decimals when you go to enter serving sizes. The other option is fractions, which used to be the default. Now that it defaults to decimals, you have to first delete the number that‚Äôs already there before you can enter your serving size. Who makes these ‚Äúbrilliant‚Äù decisions???

Better than Noom I have found it comparable to Noom but at a fraction of the cost (that‚Äôs if you opt for the premium package). One of my favorite features is being able to upload recipes by simply copying the link. Huge time saver!

Offline mode??? I used to love this app and now whenever I go to use it, it won‚Äôt let me unless I‚Äôm connected to WiFi. It constantly says ‚Äúoffline mode‚Äù or ‚Äúcheck internet connection‚Äù when trying to look up foods. I have 5G and internet on my phone through my carrier. Why the sudden change in the app not working. I deleted the app and reinstalled it and now it won‚Äôt let me log in. It‚Äôs stating it is ‚Äúunable to connect to the server‚Äù.

Better Than All The Rest The user interface is excellent! Very intuitive throughout. The number of brand name items and Franchise restaurant foods is impressive! You‚Äôll find the calories for almost anything here!

Intrusive new tracking - goodbye forever The Dec 2019 update has made it impossible to say I don‚Äôt consent to providing precise location information. Now, every. single. time. I open the app, I have to dismiss not 1 but 2 pop-ups before I can use the app. It can‚Äôt be a persistent setting?! Also the support site is down? so I can‚Äôt complain about this in the appropriate venue. Boo. I‚Äôm about to switch back to LoseIt.

Love the app has become super buggy This app has been an instrumental tool in my fitness regiment over the years and I‚Äôve built up a size-able amount of data. That being said, I rely on this app working and it‚Äôs become super buggy. The UI refresh was nice but I noticed more bugs afterwards. Sometimes the screen will freeze up or I‚Äôll add a food and it won‚Äôt appear in my Food Diary.

Best app ever This app has been great at keeping me calorie count in check. It has been very helpful to monitor my nutritional intake as well. I‚Äôve been battling for over year to get this excess weight off and I‚Äôm finally making progressüòÅ

Want Net Carb tracking I see I‚Äôm not the only one, either. Please make this a priority! Keto lifestyles are really big right now, and even with keeping notes, it‚Äôs still disconcerting to see such a huge carb count in my macros since it won‚Äôt show net carbs. I love everything else about this app, though!

MyFitnessPal is amazing This app is fantastic and will help you get on track with your nutrition. Be honest and track everything that goes in your body. Wether your goal is to lose weight or live a healthy lifestyle.. this is the perfect app to help you visually.
Fantastic I‚Äôm not sure why I haven‚Äôt used this long ago. There‚Äôs so much info and great feedback to see your goals and a visual to see if you hit your goal.

Could be better I couldn‚Äôt put in the weight of my own food! So I have to eat more or less because you give me only opportunity to chose from existing food weight at the list. Or if you have that option it‚Äôs really hard to find it! In 3 days I couldn‚Äôt find it and stopped using that app.

A++ Very detailed in every way in regards to keeping up with what you eat. I love how when you complete your diary for the day it tells you that if every day were like that day your projected weight would be such and such

Best App Ever Love it. Easy to track calorie intake. It also has ton of foods and drinks that are program into app so that you don‚Äôt have manually input the nutritional facts. It also allows you to scan items that have a barcode.

Calorie/step ratio accuracy Thanks to MyFitnessPal, I‚Äôve been able to shed almost 20 lbs. My one and only issue (but an important one) is that some days the credit I should get for steps  is either not accurate or shows 0 for any amount of strips as much as 13,000 steps ‚Äú0‚Äù,  If that were improved I‚Äôd definitely give a 5 star.

Amazing and EASY!!! This app is so easy cause I can still eat what ever I want and I lost 6lbs in the first month of using the app so I really recommend this app for any one who wants to lose weight and still be able to eat what ever they want üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª

Good app bad nutrition database This is a great tool for those who want to be healthier. This tool would be even better if they could provide nutritional information on suggested restaurants. Allow us to submit and then add that restaurant to your data base. Tink-A-Taco has three or four items in the current database and how do we know the values listed are accurate?

I expect more for a $50 subscription The app is clunky and not user friendly. Logging  from the desktop is a little better. Strong emphasis on little. I signed up for the subscription w/ a 30 month trial and just cancelled because there has got to be something better out there. Disappointed!

Love ! So easy to navigate.  Like the fact u can take pics of yourself to show progress. No judging when u leave for a month a return. Breaks down how many calories to loose weigh. Great articles on recipes and work outs

Fitness Trackers I love this app, it‚Äôs useful and truthfully it deserves 5 stars, it gets three because of the incompatibility of UA Record with any other device other then UA‚Äôs fitness tracker, I don‚Äôt mind paying the extra money for the premium services. But I don‚Äôt like being held to proprietary devices for the sake of more profit.

Great app Easy to use, has a large library of barcodes that makes it easy to scan on the go. And tracking food and exercise gives me a general idea of how I am maintaining my health. Also, the blogs can be educational.

Low carb diets are tedious with MyFitnessPal. It‚Äôs baffling that MyFitnessPal has been around for so long and has never included net carbs as an option. Hell, by now I would expect to be able to discriminate between the two types of fiber and only subtract one or the other as well as both.

Good but could be better So far lost 23 pounds using this app. The only glitch that‚Äôs really bothering me right now is that it won‚Äôt let me see my weekly digest! It keeps telling me to login but it won‚Äôt even let me do that. Pls fix.

Get it fixed already. I used to love this app.  Now it seems that every time there an update there‚Äôs a new bug.  The Fitbit interface never works.  I‚Äôve tried everything that they have suggested and what Fitbit has suggested- nothing has fixed it.

Like it but where are my recipes I was using this app and had to stop for a while. When I logged back in all the recipes I had previously entered and saved were gone. Where did they go, why weren‚Äôt they saved on my profile??? It‚Äôs good for tracking calories, I lost about 10 pounds but now I have to re-enter all the recipes ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è and that is time consuming and tedious.

Generally good, but increasingly buggy MyFitnessPal is a good concept and I have enjoyed using it in the past. Now it seems like it‚Äôs one issue after another. Today the website and app can‚Äôt agree on what I are.
Login error I always stay ahead with automatic updates but today it kept logging me out

Off line mode keeps kicking me out It works for a day ir two then I have to uninstall and reinstall the app. When it works it works great! But the offline mode wont allow me to search any foods. Thats the whole point.

Sell out app Used to love this app before all of the "premium" features started having to be paid for.  The app was completely free when I initially downloaded it YEARS ago.  I don't understand why they got greedy and I don't appreciate it.  The app is not nearly as easy to navigate or use since these features were introduced.  The app used to be intuitive and easy.  Not sure why they want individuals to pay for an inferior product.

Does what it says I keep getting logged out randomly on my phone, which seems like it may be some sort of app issue. Kind of annoying to deal with when I want to quickly input my meal before I forget, but need to get back to work.

Keeps freezing A lot of people recommended this app to me, and it‚Äôs great! The only problem I am having is that it keeps freezing after I log in any exercises or any of the food I eat. If you guys could fix that, it would make the app a lot better! :)

Increases awareness I love using this app as it increases my awareness of how much and what I eat. Journaling allows me to identify habits, good and bad, and how my body tolerates particular foods.  It‚Äôs easy to adjust macro goals. To make a great app greater it wold be helpful to have the carbs broken down to Net carbs. Developers, can you incorporate this into the next update please!

I‚Äôm on Keto and this app is wonderful, helping keep up with my diet and everything...BUT I want to be able to go back and edit my original recipes to be more Keto friendly without having to START ALL OVER and put all the ingredients again again. I use a lot of items.
Crashing All of sudden this afternoon, the app stopped working. Crashes every time I open it up. Worked fine this morning. I‚Äôve updated it so not sure what the problem is.

Great Fitness Buddy This is a must have for anyone that‚Äôs serious about working out! It has every important aspect of great workouts and results. It becomes difficult and putting daily intake data but the results are worth.

On Track with MyFitnessPal This app helped go from 206 down to 162 pounds over nine month period.  It has been a daily support.  Since then it has helped me stay between 162 and 168 for six months.  It made loosing weight as simple as possible.

Can‚Äôt log food by grams or units directly Can‚Äôt log food directly by unit must use a fraction or decimal to achieve specific consumption. I.e. 1 serving of peanut butter = 32g if you eat 10g you must go to calculator and divide 10/32 and then use the decimal to indicate consumption. Unnecessary flaw probably easy to correct. Significant enough for me to give three stars as someone who measures most of her food.
Slow downs and freeze ups since the last update . . . But at least the ads are still getting through just fine! Because hey, I need those ads!

Slow and annoying ads Lately I‚Äôve been getting these ads that completely interrupt what I‚Äôm doing on the app and any music I have playing. They repeatedly show up even when exiting out. They don‚Äôt even load properly I just get a black video player. Also the app has been more battery hungry and slow in the past few months.

Been Using For Years I‚Äôve loved this app, it helps me track my food, my weight and workouts. I‚Äôve been using it for the last few years. But lately whenever I go to enter my food into the diary; it super lags.

CONSTANTLY Logs me out! I LOVE My fitness pal BUT I wish it had more options better serving portions, especially for small portions. I have a hard time converting grams into non-metric measurements. Also, can they update a touch ID?? It keeps logging me out and I‚Äôve had to reset my passwords so many times because I have a million different passwords for everything!

Great App except for one problem I love this app, it's very easy to track your calories, carbs, sugar and fat intake.  The only problem I have is it falls off, just drops and that's very frustrating when you are in the middle of doing your daily food plan.  Other than that it's great.

App Will Not Allow Me To Sign Up I‚Äôve tried multiple times to create an account and it won‚Äôt allow me to. All it says is that they are unable to process my registration at this time. I have deleted and downloaded the app many times and it still has not allowed me to create an account. Many people have recommended this app and said great things the app provides and I am disappointed that the app is not working in my favor.

Great and annoying to use This app CONSTANTLY logs you out and erases your date. It‚Äôs not a matter of remembering your login and password or having you consistently logged in, it will force you to logout. Every time I try to make a change or update to my profile, the sec I hit go or enter it logs me out and I have to go through process again and if I‚Äôm lucky, it didn‚Äôt just erase all my data.

Can‚Äôt search for food in the database MFP I cannot search food in the app and I have an iPhone 8 and I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app and that did not fix the issue. I have no current updates for my phone or app. I‚Äôve even turned on and off my phone and that didn‚Äôt fix anything. I was considering on buying the premium edition, but I won‚Äôt until his issue is fixed. The app is only valuable because of this food database.

Had enough... Finally had enough with MFP adding more and more to the app that its become a hog - data, memory, & battery - while not letting me customize for my dietary needs. Some of us just want simplicity. Not endless features. And when another app offers a cleaner UI with a subscription for $20 LESS... I'm done with MFP til things change.

Love this App! I love this app. It really helps to hold myself accountable for the decisions I make during the day when it comes to what I eat and how much exercise I get in. I can definitely see that using this app will help me reach my weight loss goals!
A great app I like this app because it is easy to use, has the step counter, and calorie log with lots of food nutrition information already loaded. Everything I need to track my progress.
Great app for tracking calories I‚Äôve just started using this app, but it was easy to set up, common foods are searchable so you can start tracking your calorie intake easily.

Love this It has been a real motivation for my weight loss. I synced it with my Garmin so it keeps track of my calories burned during exercise. The calorie counter is very easy to use. The bar scanner has almost all the foods I eat.

It only keeps track of calories burned in a cardio manner. They need to add a way to track strength burned calories. But all in all excellent app I recommend to everyone.

Helping me make healthy choices! Thanks to MyFitnessPal for kick-starting my discipline! The accountability of logging each meal and being aware of the calories I consume is helping me to make better food choices, and keeping me on-track with my goal.

Love It!!! This app has been so helpful in my weight loss. I love that my Fitbit can connect and keep track both ways. I highly recommend this app. They have great meal plans/recipes and wonderful articles you can read.
