Now I‚Äôm only getting a total for all of the daily meals. As a type 2 diabetic, I need to know how many carbs I‚Äôve consumed in each meal.

Helps me stay fit!! Super helpful!! This is a rockstar app I love how it lets you save all the frequent foods that you use so you don't have to retype them. I love that gigantic library of foods you can search.

Best app Been using this app for several years. It is the best all-inclusive app around. I wish it would sync to my polar ft7, but I can manually enter the values. Also I don't trust their calorie expenditure estimates per exercise. For a food app though it is solid!
Provides useful info Helpful way to track foods eaten, one's weight and the progress made. Provides reminders of daily intake goals and amount of exercise as well as basic nutritional information.

Annoying to use with Fitbit This app is ok but it can never find my Fitbit. I have to constantly open the website and reconnect to it. It‚Äôs SO very annoying. I‚Äôve complained to their help desk many times and although they always fix the issue, it never stays fixed.

My motivation I absolutely love this app!! Every time I see my weight go down in the progress section I'm motivated to keep going. Without this app showing me what I'm taking in daily, I understand now how easy it is to over eat!!

Keeping up with my goals! This is the first tool I have ever found that helps me keep up with my calorie intake and output via exercise.  I do not feel bad if I want an unhealthy snack, I just choose to exercise a little more or reduce my calorie intake for a latter meal.

Complete system The My Fitness Pal app is the most complete system and easiest to use. The scan function is a fast way to finding the ingredient with all the nutritional information and likely portion size.

The app helps me keep on track on what I eat I like this app it helps me to know what I am eating & how much calories I should have. I intend on continue with it. I Have lost 4 pounds in a week. I recommend this 2 all of my friends & family

Great app needs recipe sharing Use this app daily because it‚Äôs a great way to track my macros and show my results... but please give the ability to share your meals with friends (sending recipes to them so they can save them, sending meals so they can save them, etc)

Fitness Best thing in the whole world! This is the only way I could hold my self accountable for falling out but at the same time I wasn‚Äôt punishing myself because as long as I tracked I could make up for the small portion of ‚Äúbad‚Äù food I consumed

Awful No significant updates other than bombarding the whole UI with ADS. Deceptive and sneaky manner in placing ADS right next to UI functionality. Deleting and going back with Lose It app. I originally switched from Lose it app when I first purchased an iPhone. Now, going back after years on this app. What a waste. Helped me with accountability This app has really helped me with holding myself accountable. I love how you track everything and how it connects to your health app. Tracking food is also easier than I thought!

Able to use it effectively Tried using so many app but what matters is if you are able to use it effectively. This app has necessary inputs which you can enter quickly and get going.

Knowledgeable is power This app is amazing. Knowledge is power and you only know what you know. Who would have known... a cup of spaghetti is 800 calories. I‚Äôm learning a lot and losing weight. My husband and I are doing it together. Life changing. I highly recommend.

Food recipe search doesnt work Paid for premium to be able fo search for recipes & what types of foods to eat in order to reach my goal but after searching for different types of foods they all say no search found. Finally logged in and super disappointed. First i was Trying to login and they claimed they were emailing me my password reset but it took most of the day just to get that email. Now I can‚Äôt get it to sync with my Fitbit despite doing everything they said. The fact they have no chat function for tech support makes it clear this is a 2nd class operation. So far I am nothing but disappointed.

Success My fitness pal has helped me immensely .  I am in control of what I choose to eat and how I choose to spend my calories each day. I have lost 43 pounds and feel in control again. Thank you so very much

Easy to use! I‚Äôve used myfitnesspal on and off for several years. Every time with the results I‚Äôm looking for. Easy to use with attainable goals. I‚Äôve recommended to family, friends and patients.

Error in potassium counts I would give this app a five (or more!) but have discovered inaccuracies in the potassium counts.  This makes me wonder if there are more errors in tracking nutritional amounts. Counting potassium is important to me because of health issues so I have reverted to counting it separately.   The app is easy to use and helpful.
Progress report I use my fitness daily. I recommend this tool to anyone trying to loose weight.

This app is great but requires us to calculate net carbs on our own. And that‚Äôs a pain. Add the feature and allow us to have it as our chosen display should we choose this. Thanks!

When I open the app it takes me to the goals wizard  and then it forces me to accept the goals using the wizard you setup which over rides the nutrition settings I manually set... this happens every day and several times throughout the day every time I open the app. Sooooooo annoying.

Exercise I‚Äôm really enjoying watching my progress using fitness pal.  I just wish that there was caloric expenditures for strength training and not just cardio, especially since the latest research shows that strength training can be more effective in weight management than cardio.

Fluids ideas When you‚Äôre selecting what you drink underwater water switch it to a liquid‚Äôs and then when you press on it have a branch off to waters or liquids because the fruit drinks I‚Äôm drinking and I put it underneath food

Tried and true It‚Äôs everything you need and more. Do it alone or with friends or support groups. Nutrition statists. Water consumption. Workouts. Pairs with Fitbit or other fitness training apps. It‚Äôs a cornucopia of wonderments for the least to most motivated individual.

the best food diary app! Where have you been, this is the best food diary app ever! Weight watchers pales in comparison. My only wish is that the app had the power to pinch me on the days I don‚Äôt log my food.....have your software designers look into that.

Log in bug I love this app but I can‚Äôt log in. I have been using it for years now but i keep trying to log in and it says it can‚Äôt connect to the server. I tried deleting and reinstalling, shutting off my wifi, and going to a different location to see if it was my service. Please fix this bug

They are always trying to sell you something Why should you have to pay a fairly high monthly subscription and then be subjected to inapp sales pitches on a almost constant bases.... well I can‚Äôt think of a good reason either:.... why would I want something from Dicks sporting goods from a dammed fitness program.... I can‚Äôt think one either....

Goes offline regularly When the app is functioning it‚Äôs really neat and convenient. However, the app has gone offline multiple times in the short time I‚Äôve used it and this prevents you from adding new foods. Everything online says there‚Äôs no fix but to wait. This could be improved.

Good, but decides it‚Äôs ‚Äúoffline mode‚Äù lately Barcode feature & adjustable serving size is great. Also love that it allows weight gain goal. App never connects to internet My internet is always working perfectly fine except when I click this app it never connects and when I have to put the food I ate it never searches for the food and says no results found. It‚Äôs frustrating and makes me want to find a new app that tracks what I eat.
No support for malfunctioning Premium I have emailed several times without an response- but to pay $50 for an app and not be able to access the features is ridiculous.

Great food tracker app Great way to track your food and it holds you accountable, lost 5 lbs in a month and a half just by being more conscious of what I eat and do. Super easy to make recipes and import them from online even

More on track than I‚Äôd hoped for... I was looking to count calories, but what i got was a fabulous electronic accountability partner! It‚Äôs not only keeping me accountable for daily calories, but for nutrition and sugars and more! It also works well with planet fitness app and apple health app

My fitness pal success! I‚Äôm just three days I have been able to manage my foods done to a T. And with consistent exercise along with healthy eating I have already hit my goal for the week of 2 lbs! Can‚Äôt wait for my weigh in on Monday!

Great fitness tracking app I‚Äôve used this app every single day and it‚Äôs helped a lot with letting me track the nutritional info of what I‚Äôm eating. I just wish they allowed us to track calories burned when weight lifting, so I can be even more accurate with my deficits or surpluses.

Very helpful Awesome to help keep you in track and love that it gets your steps/workout from other apps to help be more accurate. Also like that it has quite a few restaurant menus on there to help make smarter choices

Love it, but.... I wish there weren‚Äôt so many ads to go ‚ÄúPremium‚Äù!! It doesn‚Äôt even tell you anywhere how much it costs to upgrade, which I google searched and found where someone said it was $9.99/mo. Holy cow!!  Otherwise this is a great app for tracking calories, macros, exercise and more!

Useful, but slow I use this app to help keep track of my macros daily. It‚Äôs incredibly helpful, but around a minute of having this app open, it becomes unresponsive and slow. Closing out the app and reopening it seems to fix this problem, but it‚Äôs annoying to do this over and over again.

Drains my battery I‚Äôve used my fitness pal before, but took a long break from it. I recently went back to using it again and it drains my battery like no tomorrow. At first I thought it was just my phone, but it‚Äôs the app. I can be on 100% and while I‚Äôm on it for a mere 5 minutes, my batter goes down to 70%. Is there a way to fix this or address this issue? I loveeee the app capabilities, but I just can‚Äôt be on it. It also freezes up.

Brilliant and worth it I just started and it‚Äôs such an addictive app for help in your diet. You can even look up food and drinks from Starbucks and salads from a bunch of places and link to your food diary. This may be the best health app I have seen.

Overall I love the app Big suggestion: please, please, please allow me to see the ingredients in a recipe I‚Äôve created after it‚Äôs in my recipe list. It would be sooo useful to be able to store healthy recipes in the app.

Needs usability improvements The ‚Äòcreate a food‚Äô feature should have a barcode reader so that we don‚Äôt have to manually enter information. Sometimes, I add a new food to the diary, but the food is not found afterwards in my ‚ÄòFoods‚Äô section.

Such an awesome app!! Helps hold you accountable to what you decide to put in your mouth!  It helps track the ratios between carbs, fat, and protein so I know what to adjust as my day goes on.  The scan feature makes planning so easy!
Great app...net carbs calculation needed This app does what it says: easily tracks nutrition and fitness info.

Great when it works Lately it has been kicking me out every time I move away from the app and no matter how many times I reset my password it won‚Äôt let me back in. Then sometimes it will be signed in when I open the app again, and an hour later it will have kicked me out again. I spend so much time trying to log in it‚Äôs not even worth it.

Used to be good; now they charge you This used to be a good app. Now it‚Äôs full of annoying ads. Options that were free before, such as nutrient tracking are now ~$4.00 a month!! Also, it lost all my meals, and it‚Äôs impossible to add new meals. Oh wait, if I PAID to do what I used to do for FREE, maybe I‚Äôll get all my meals back and be able to add more. I hate it when I like an app and then the best things about it become ‚Äúpremium‚Äù. Definitely not recommending this app.

Love this app I love this app!!! It really makes tracking my food super easy if premium was a little less than $10 a month I would totally use it! Even $7 a month would be better. Just to expensive. Other than that the app free is really good and I love this app!

Huh? I‚Äôm sure this app is good, but it won‚Äôt let me register or log in with Facebook, saying ‚ÄúSorry, we are unable to process your registration at this time.‚Äù I‚Äôve also tried it over and over again throughout the day and still nothing. Please help

Cannot sign up/ log in When I downloaded the app and tried to create an account, it said ‚Äúsorry we are unable to process your registration at this time‚Äù I deleted the app and redownloaded it but the message keeps popping up. I went to the under armor site to make an account that way but when I got back to MyFitnessPal, it did not work. I don‚Äôt know if this is because if the update or some other isssue, but please fix this.

LOVE this app! It has so many useful features! My personal trainer is able to view every single entry I make as well as my progress. I can also import recipes I‚Äôve made from the web for my daily food entries. No more guess work! So easy! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!! ‚ù§Ô∏è

Easy App to use as far as evaluating nutrition, tracking weight and activity. Great App for tracking calories and nutrition. This is a very user friendly way to graph weight loss and keep a record of daily, weekly progress.

Perfect App This is about the only app that is free, doesn‚Äôt charge you for every little thing. I love that it gives you the macros breakdown, notifies you when you have too much sodium and such. It keeps you aware of the types of intake. Best App ever.

Won‚Äôt sync I‚Äôve been using the app for about 3 months now and have been really happy with it.  I also use Fitbit to track my steps.  Most of the time both apps work great together but now MFP will not sync with Fitbit.  I have removed Fitbit from MFP and reconnected, that worked for about a day, but not a process I want to go through daily

Wish it had more exercise/calorie choices I keep coming back to this app. I have not found one I like more for tracking. My only wish is I look for exercises that I have done in a work out and feel unable to track properly.

Not just for Weight Loss I am 30 pounds under the weight I need to be. This is the first calorie tracker I have ever used, and I just love how it doesn‚Äôt just cater to weight loss. There are several helpful articles and recipes on gaining some weight.

author_name: The Guy who is way cooler then the whining one
review_body: Still the best app out there, hands down Forget games, cellphone tracking, fantasy sports and even face to face chats. This app is the absolute best! Have no idea how to track calories or diet? This app is the tool to get you on track. Very powerful app!
MyFitnessPal My fitness pal is easy and convenient to use .  And since it shows you how many calories you have left at any point you don't even need a calculator.  It has helped me lose 30 pounds.

Great application I love this application and I use it everyday!  FitnessPal keeps me on track with food, water and exercise and I have lost 31.  I also love the blog with great information about food and exercise!  You can't go wrong with this application!

Disappointed It‚Äôs really hard to believe or understand why this app works with every imitation Apple Watch knock off but don‚Äôt sync with the actual Apple Watch. Would be a perfect app if it did. Why take the time to create a iPhone app and a Apple Watch app and then it‚Äôs the only device that it DON‚ÄôT work with?? Good app but deleted I deleted the app because I just don‚Äôt use it anymore, it has nothing to do with if it‚Äôs good or bad, it‚Äôs great but I just don‚Äôt need it at the moment but they keep charging me so that‚Äôs the only downside ü§¶üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èü§¶üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

Be careful! Subscription date missmatch -> trap!!! I was trying the free month and knew I had to cancel on time. The App showed me a Date. The Day before I went into the Appstore to cancel the free month but saw surprisingly the Subscription renewed for 1year (before the EndDate)! I contacted support, they referred to Apple, Apple rejected a Refund. The Date Mismatch seems to be on purpose as well the default of 1yr vs a month! Now I paid $50 for a App I just tried out!!! Specifically it gives you a red warning when an item is high in saturated fat, despite the ‚Äúsaturated fat is bad‚Äù myth being unequivocally proven to be just that, a myth.

Missing some very basic features. It‚Äôs a good app, somewhat bulky but useable. Great app BUT... Latest update has been having issues freezing on my phone and constantly claiming it is in offline mode with stable strong connectivity (both WiFi and Cellar).  Don‚Äôt know if the two issues are linked just really frustrating to use.

I love this app but it keeps force closing I love this app and use it everyday. I‚Äôve lost 5 pounds in 6 weeks. Unfortunately since the update it keeps force closing and I can‚Äôt use the app. I‚Äôve tried restarting my phone and deleting and downloading the app again and still can‚Äôt use the app. Please fix and I will definitely change my rating

Love the updates! I have been this app for over 5 years now off and on. I‚Äôm back on and I love all of the new updates. I want to use this app indefinitely to maintain my goal weight! Keep up the good job!üëçüèæ

Glitchy It used to work just fine... then after a few updates it‚Äôs become really glitchy. Takes forever to log in any food or exercise because long pauses. And it drains battery so fast just to input items in my diary. Contemplating if I should uninstall.

At the top This is the best app that I‚Äôve found. Super easy to track food and drink. The challenges that you can join are fun and keeps you motivated to keep up with your exercises. I like it...I like it a lot.ü§ôüí™

Great app with some attitude This app is great, but I didn‚Äôt log my meals for 3 days then it sent me a passive aggressive notification that made me delete the app, if you want to see what the message is just don‚Äôt open the app for 3 days. Great app though, highly recommend for keeping track of calories and fitness goals!!

Would Be 5 Stars But It Keeps Crashing I use this app daily to track my nutrient intake, but it crashes multiple times on a daily basis. If this one thing were fixed, I would definitely give it 5 stars!

What happened?! This app has been great for years! But now it‚Äôs not even functional. It freezes and stops working every time I open it. Calories go blank or don‚Äôt update at the top of the page. Constantly have to close the app and reload it just to add ONE entry! So frustrating... Sadly I‚Äôm gonna download a different Calories Tracker. Can‚Äôt deal with the extra frustration anymore, dieting is hard enough!

Apple Watch Experience I highly recommend to the developer to add the ability to see total water intake, and not just the ability to add water. It would be good if they could add that to the nutrients section or any section. This complaint is only towards the Apple Watch functionality.

Paywal to remove frustrating features The quality of the app has seriously gone down, did they really remove the option to turn off exercise calories and put it behind a paywall? When you add a premium pay service it should only enhance the user experience not make it more frustrating. Your guys broke af.

Awful It works well enough for tracking food, but it wouldn‚Äôt let me put in any exercise and would make the calories I burned negative! The interface was really hard to use, and it doesn‚Äôt let me put in calories I burned with strength workouts! Overall very clunky. If you want to use this  to actually get a accurate idea of how many calories you take in each day, go somewhere else.

Impossible to receive assistance Customer support is lacking. I had an issue with my account and tried submitting a help ticket but just before submitting, it brought me to FAQs that closely resemble the Text in my issue. It not only did not answer my question, there was no option for me to choose that it didn‚Äôt solve my issue and submit my form.

Very useful but updates stink The latest updates took away a feature that I really loved. I used to be able to access recent foods to add according to what meal was eaten but now all of my recent foods show up to be sifted through. I could go to "meals" and just add exactly the same as the day before but then I need to edit it after if it wasn't exactly the same. Blah.
Best way to keep weight in check This is the best resource for tracking food and the database seems to have everything in there. Adding recipes is very easy too.

Review This app is great for scanning and finding food to make it easy to log. But it does take a lot of choices before your to the scanning mode.  Lots already in there. But I wish I could edit the food after I'd entered it if I discover I made a mistake.
Makes weight loss more attainable. Easy to use. Huge database with most foods already in it, making it easy & fast to input data. Only thing that really works for me.

Steadily losing fat and gaining muscle Loveeee this app! I use it everyday and it has made tracking macros so much easier, it's a life saver. I have been using it for the past ~20days and have lost 5 pounds. Highly recommend.

Good app for increasing dietary awareness This app really keeps me aware of what I‚Äôm eating and its nutritional value. My only complaint is that I‚Äôm unable to share recipes that I‚Äôve cooked and logged on the app with my husband. Bro g able to share created recipes would bump this to a 5 star rating.

Bad experience I purchased the premium subscription and my bank account was charged. The app failed to update to premium through some technical glitch. I tried to send a message to tech support for help and to ask for a refund and the app kept crashing. This used to be such a great app but I have had nothing but problems with it today. I have now paid over $50 for nothing :-(
Amazing I‚Äôve been using this for a couple of days and I must say it really works. It helped me notice how I was over eating and even keeps track with how much exercise in a day.

Great App!! This app is amazing, the fact that it has sooo many foods already listed with the correct calorie count is amazing! No other app has that many food calorie counts if you search it! The accuracy is spot on!

Great App For My Fitness Success This App has helped me to lose over 85 pounds, logging my daily meals and exercises help me stay on track. The App even connects to my Fitbit and work together to give me the greatest summary of my daily efforts...

It works!!! You just gotta use it and do it !!! No excuses and log EVERYTHING that you put into your body! This app is perfect for that! Great social motivation too! You can do it!! Consistency is the key to achieving your goals! Love this app for that!
I never leave reviews If you log your information in and stay under what the app recommends, you will lose weight. Simple as that!

Slow Performance I want to like this app but it is so slow when launching. It seems like it has to log in each time it launched which is slow. I am using this on the older iPhone 6+ but don‚Äôt think that‚Äôs it as other apps work fine. I tried contacting support but no response. Frustrating and looking for an alternative.
I want to like it, but they make it hard. I‚Äôd be more than willing to pay for this app, but they refuse to add features people have been asking for. (Apple Watch complications specifically.)

The best choice IÔ∏è ever made This app changed my life! Working in the medical field I‚Äôm always taking care of others and this app allowed me the flexibility, accountability and knowledge to make a difference in my life. No greater trainer at no cost!
Very helpful I am amazed at the library of food items in the database. I‚Äôll search for an item I doubted would be in it and find it! It had really helped me stay on track.
Swell program Easily tracks calories, nutrients, exercise, weight, etc.‚Äî‚Äî‚Äîjust as easily as you take care of yourself and input the data.  A real facilitator for a person who wants to do it.
Great app!! I‚Äôve been using this for years. Will never use a different app. Don‚Äôt even have to buy the premium, this app has everything I need!! :) definitely worth the download.
Great way to get back on track Been using this app for a few years.  It is a great way to monitor yourself and your calories.  I just turned it back in to start the year.
Great but aggravating Use this app off and on. But when I log back in using Facebook and same email, it makes me create an account but won't let me because the email is already being used.

Love this Love this app.  Makes you feel more in control of your eating habits.  Very easy to use.  The daily estimate of your future weight based on your food intake of the day is a great motivator to stay on track.

The Nexus of fitness apps MyFitnessPal does what none of the current stable of fitness apps I currently use can do, it syncs with all of them! It‚Äôs a must have dashboard that combines my Fitbit, Schwinn, MapMyRide and Apple‚Äôs Health. I went premium on this one and I‚Äôm a sort of miser.
My weight loss companion This app has helped me lose between 5 and 60+ lbs before. When I track everything I am successful and this app helps me more than any other.

Good app for tracking. Great feature showing calorie amounts. Being prompted to log a meal I‚Äôve already logged or getting repeated reminders within 1 minute of the other: 3 in 3 minutes. Annoying. Otherwise solid.
The Best Fitness App in the Planet I have tried numerous apps in last few years. Every app kept coming and going away. This one stayed. And will stay ! Will upgrade to premium soon too.
Quality App This is a great app and superior to others I have tried. It allows you to track macros and log custom workout routines for free which most other apps charge for.
A Huge Help Logging everything really makes you aware of what and how much you are eating.  My trainer suggested it and it‚Äôs helping me make better choices for weight loss and overall health.
Latest update issues Please fix the ability to set default diary settings. The latest update now defaults to decimal but I prefer fractions. I have used it for 1400 days and the change is annoying.

I‚Äôm impressed! This app made me realize how many calories I was eating. It helped me make healthier food choices and cut back on other things. It also made me realize just how sedentary my life is, and inspired me move more. I bet it would be worth going premium.

Premium Disappointment I‚Äôm really frustrated with MyFitnessPal. My two biggest pain points are 1) I cannot scan barcodes using my iPad - I see a gray screen that says ‚ÄúSearching...‚Äù but the camera never activates - and 2) it doesn‚Äôt sync quickly with entries made on my phone and computer. For $50, I expect basic features like this to work.
Why I like it Works well for me.  Keeping a running total

Doesn‚Äôt work well with Apple Watch The lose it app works better with the Apple Watch. I don‚Äôt like that I can‚Äôt set it as a favorite on my home screen and it doesn‚Äôt seem to work with my workouts. I admit that might not be the app, I am having issues with my activity app right now.

Works great My opinion is the best app ever cause i love the breakdown pics under ‚Äònutrition‚Äô tab. I modified for keto diet and it works great! Many of my foods i add all info myself cause sometimes other people have shown 10 carbs for 10oz of meat.
Helpful for those looking to get back on track! I really enjoy using this app to track calories and weight loss. It‚Äôs helping me to stay motivated and get back to myself!

New download not working How can we expect to use this correctly wen I can‚Äôt even get it to record my information correctly to set it up? I continue to put my date of birth in and it keeps reverting to a diff birth date. Same with eight , height, etc etc. This app was recommended but I can‚Äôt get past the signing up with all these errors already. Disappointed immediately. Doesn‚Äôt look good to me.

Was Better Before All of the Ads While still useable, it‚Äôs a shame to see what has become of this app. It‚Äôs just filled with unwanted ads and videos. They ruined it over the almighty dollar. I‚Äôm not going to pay for premium, so keep on spamming me with a bunch of lame ads for things I would never consider buying. I need to to lose weight!
This is a confidence saver This is the only app that I have been able to lose the weight I wanted to with. To put it short this app single handedly helped me build my confidence and look great!

Excellent app for knowing what you put inside your body I hope that the developers add more food lists specially from Arabic language and countries. Thank you so much for this amazing easy to use app.

Update makes me log in every time When I click on the app to enter my foods into my diary, I now have to ‚Äúlog  in‚Äù every single time, whereas I NEVER HAD TO BEFORE. Great, But One Change Request Love this app. It works and I‚Äôm down 8 lbs. thank you. A recent design change removed all the color from the screen so everything is white. PLEASE put the blue header blocks back in. Easier to read that way for my aging eyes.

Just started My 4 day doing great, still need to learn how

Cfishgo2016 I have had a Garmin activity trackers for years that synced with fitness pal.  I just bought the Garmin 235 and it will link to fitness pal website but it won‚Äôt sync to the app.  So,  I don‚Äôt know if is Garmin or fitness pal issue. Other than that Fitness pal is a great tool.
Absolutely works for me like no other plan I can see exactly where I am eating too much or not enough and it gives me complete food balance. Love this plan it is working

Not Syncing Meals I have used and loved My Fitness Pal for years. Ever since the last update however, the app keeps asking me to record meals that I have already recorded: breakfast, lunch and dinner. This happens on a daily basis and has become extremely annoying. PLEASE FIX THIS IMMEDIATELY!!!

I can‚Äôt create an account! I was hoping of coming back here to write a positive review on the app, but that‚Äôs not possible because it can‚Äôt ‚Äúprocess [my] registration at the time‚Äù. Good not great. One annoying bug!! Whenever select ‚ÄúAdd Exercise‚Äù I have to tap twice because the link isn‚Äôt responsive. The same can be said for entering either Cardio or Strength on the next menu screen. Otherwise the app is great for what it is.

Hope you don‚Äôt need to add a recipe Every time I need to add a recipe or a meal it never saves properly and always has an error. It doesn‚Äôt matter if I‚Äôm on WiFi or data. It always says it can‚Äôt be synced but that it was saved and then I have to wait forever for it to show up. It‚Äôs the same if I try to save and log it. Please please please fix this issue.

AD You all should seriously consider adding a ‚Äúnet‚Äù carb feature to the meal and daily totals. Also, the weight tracker starting weight keeps changing as I‚Äôm losing weight. It would be nice to see the original weight stay static so I could celebrate lbs lost. Otherwise. Good app.

What is going on with this app?? I used to really like this app - but the last couple of months it‚Äôs been really buggy! And seems to be getting worse, rather than better. And I see I‚Äôm not the only one having problems.

Latest version hangs and crashes The latest version of the app consistently hangs and crashes (seems to be trying to update or query the cloud) and does so for more than a minute or until the app hangs and you need to close and restart it.  Makes it essentially unusable.  Hope a new version fixes the consistent crashing or need to switch to another macro tracking app.
Great guide I really enjoy this app. I always know where I stand on the amount of calories as well as a nutrients I‚Äôm getting and where I need to do less or more to stay healthy and lose weight.

The BEST tool Regardless of your individual healthy living goals or which diet plan you choose to follow, the MYFITNESSPAL APP is a vital link in helping meet those goals. It is easy to use and helps me stay on track on my weight loss journey!

The only way to avoid ad‚Äôs is to buy a very expensive subscription.  After a few more updates it will be 100% ad‚Äôs. So annoying it‚Äôs not worth using.
Weight loss I really have enjoyed tracking my weight loss progress using this wonderful useful tool.

author_name: New York Is Too Much Sometimes
review_body: Super helpful A great app for keeping track of calories, nutrition, and exercise. I have My Fitness Pal connected to Strava and my FitBit. It takes some discipline but if you stick to it, it will help you lose weight.

Lag Been using this app for years with no issues. Starting about 3 weeks ago, the app lags like crazy and takes about 4 restarts to get back to normal functioning. Otherwise, this is a 5 star app. Alas, I‚Äôm afflicted with an issue that causes me to spend minutes just trying to log a meal.

author_name: I hate this app so much stop
review_body: Poor start. I have used this app in the past but when I tried tried using it years later but I wouldn‚Äôt even let me make an account. Day after day it said please try again later. I would love to have this changed because from what I understand that‚Äôs my only issue. I was good in my memories but awful now.

Does not sync to Fitbit! I love the app to log in my calories and was so happy to see that it syncs with Fitbit....except it doesn‚Äôt. If this problem would be fixed, I would give this app 5 stars. I see people have been complaining about this problem for many months. What a bummer.

Pretty good but... It‚Äôs annoying that mfp will not record steps from the Apple health app (or at least not for me, for some reason). I have had to download UA record in order to track my steps for mfp. This is dumb. You should just have one app that you can do all the UA exercise/diet/step counting on. It‚Äôs called MyFITNESSPal, not my calorie counter.

Battery drain Used this app in the past and it was massively helpful to see what‚Äôs really going on to lose weight. Just re-installed it to use it again and it‚Äôs a complete battery drain. Drops multiple % per minute when using it and nearly as bad when running in the background. Makes it impossible to use the app ... and my phone. Please fix whatever you‚Äôre doing.

Great but... I really like this app. I‚Äôve been using it on/off for about 4 years. I remember when there were no ads. I love the recipes and meal prep ideas. The only annoying thing is that it keeps signing me out and it keeps telling me I have the incorrect log in. Ugh so annoying. Please fix it.

Horrible customer service I have repeatedly tried to get ahold of someone through continuous email to fix my account. No response!!! It really pisses me off that you took my subscription (2 of them) which I want a refund for the second!) and it didn‚Äôt load to my phone it even changed my user name. I have been a member since 2014.... it lost everything and gave me a new identity! Fix this please!!!!

Has lots of issues Half the time I enter foods and they do not pick up the time of day. So many issues with it and horrible UI/UX. Disgusting. Their premium features are a total joke too. This app seems very poorly designed and maintained. Also, it opens on a ‚Äúnews‚Äù page, with articles of questionable scientific accuracy, so i have to switch over to the diary tab every time i open it. Waste of time.

Can‚Äôt search foods This app won‚Äôt let you search foods. I have tried everything that they suggest... Closing app and restarting, redownloading, clicking the ‚Äúsearch‚Äù button, I have even turned off cellular data and turned it back on.

This app is greatish but five star worthy nonetheless This app really keeps me honest in my dieting whether trying to lose weight or gain it. I wish it had a better metric for tracking my activity but it‚Äôs been great

App on iPhone has issues with health app The app is really good but since I got my Apple Watch and I try to keep track of my burned calories this app keeps getting wrong information from the health app. I thought it would be just a bug they would fix right away. But it has been 3 months now and I keep getting the same error.

Great way to lose weight! Calorie counting(CICO) is one of the most proven ways to lose weight, and with this app it makes that possible. For the free version, it is all you need. A vast selection of foods including their caloric nutrition. Great app

Data base for food I have sent several emails on why I can‚Äôt access the database of food with NO response. I don‚Äôt want to only be able to log only the foods I have already eaten. What happened to being able to type in hard boiled egg and being able to log it?

Very helpful I started a little over 3 weeks ago & have already lost 5 lbs. I‚Äôm very encouraged by this good start. While I‚Äôm still trying to figure out some of what the app can do, it has become my go-to tool along with my nutritionist.

Step Calorie Adjustment The step calorie adjustment keeps deleting the calories I did with my steps when I add another cardio exercise (which I didn‚Äôt use my step calculator for). Extremely difficult to try and find a way to get these calories back. Need to have an feature to differ steps from other cardio exercises. Actively looking for a new app to count calories and nutrition. This one is NOT user friendly.

Locks up This app has gotten worse since the last time I used it, several months ago.  I just started using it again this week.  It constantly locks up to where it takes several minutes just to add in food or create a new item.  Sorry, poor rating until that is fixed.
Gets accurate nutritional data. This Ap enables you get accurate daily calories and other nutritional data.  Really keeps you on track.
Yasss At weight watchers level tracking food and meal planning can get anyone on right track I deleted for space on my phone just reinstalled lost 4 pounds in 4 days let‚Äôs go
Love it! This app is great for counting macros and keeping track of progress. It has a handy barcode scan which will find the product you're using and calculate those macros.

I really like this app a lot I give this app 5 stars!! It's a good app and it helps me to stay on track with my eating, working out, water intake and my calories, so far I've lost 7 lbs. this app has lots of cool features
All-star weight control App I have been using the app for three years. Very instrumental in helping me lose and maintain my desired weight. If you use it, you will see results period!
Best health app ever Love this app it‚Äôs easy to work with. Helps keep track of more than just calories. Helps me be aware of my food choices with out it being exhausting to track food.

Beneficial Plan The ‚Äúmy fitness pal‚Äù has been very beneficial for me. Everyone who cares what‚Äôs nutritious/not nutritious should try this plan because it most definitely will keep you on track. A Great System MyfitnessPal keeps me on track and motivated. It has a ton of food options and I love that I can break down my own recipes. Losing weight is the true measure of any tool. I'm happy to say it's working.

Helped me lose 20 pounds Amazing and extremely helpful.  I am so lucky to have found this app.  I use it strictly for calorie counting so I can‚Äôt vouch for the exercise tracking.  For my exercise I use my Apple Watch.

Love this! This is an amazing free tool. Love it! Make sure you log everything and at the end of the day complete your diary. It‚Äôs incredibly motivating to see what my weight will be in 5 weeks the way I ate that day.
So close to 5 stars Only things I think are missing- does not have an intuitive way to link with Apple Watch and needs to support being able to share recipes with friends.
Who his life changed My life has been changed , since I know how to track myself.
Very functional and user friendly One suggestion: make ‚Äúadd sleep‚Äù an option to track hours and quality of sleep.
List geeks dream I do much better when I have a list to work from and this is perfect. Love the analytics, and making a game of hitting my targets each day. See progress steadily when I hit my goals!
Problems since iOS 11 I have used MFP for years... love it!  Since iOS 11, Messages is messed up.  I cannot reply or delete Messages.  The only thing I can do is send a new message.

Awesome APP A lot. Able to keep track of my food so effortlessly. Despite my busy work schedule as well as being retired military this is something that allows me to keep things in perspective and then fix or keep the same what I'm doing
I've lost over 100 lbs so far with MFP This is a wonderful program/community. Log your food everyday and find support through the online community and you WILL reach your goals.

I‚Äôm over it This app USED to sync to Fitbit and it was awesome but stopped back in May 2019. I figured it was my ridiculously old phone. I got a new phone and it turns out Fitbit just doesn‚Äôt sync to the app. When I disconnect and try to resync the apps, it simply sends me to the MFP website and has me sign in and says I already have it Fitbit installed. Don‚Äôt put it as an option if it doesn‚Äôt work. It‚Äôs very annoying and misleading.
Improving I had taken a break from MyFitnessPal for a while. The food entry has become much better and the plans are interesting addition.

Not worth paying for Premium App crashes. Long term bug with exercise calories turning on, unprompted, has never been fixed. Entries are duplicating or deleting randomly. These are bugs that have been reported over and over again, for well over a year by Premium (paid) members and they aren‚Äôt being addressed. Stuck with the free version or switch to an alternative app like LoseIt, Carb Manager, MyMacros+, etc.
Needs Dark Mode & Micronutrient Support I‚Äôll start off by saying that I love this app. I am an exercise science major and I have tracked macros using MyFitnessPal for several years.

Overall good, adding exercise is a fail Overall this app works well and is pretty easy to use. But it doesn‚Äôt allow you to enter exercise easily. I really just want to add the calories I burned without tracking each individual activity, which is what this app does.

None I am in love with this app! This is by far the best I have came across and is easy to log in all your foods and calculates your steps for you ! I am beyond happy with app. And will continue to use this !‚ò∫Ô∏è

Forgot my password With the never ending barrage of password generating, I have forgotten my password and this app will not send me an email to generate a new one. When I try to set up a new account with my email, it‚Äôs states that there is already an account associated with my email address. My choice is to create a new email address or use a different app. I choose to use another app. There‚Äôs always another one.
A buggy mess Love that they have dozens of bugs that literally never get fixed because under armor is going out of business slowly and they‚Äôve decided their days are numbered so who cares.
Not a good experience Apps are supposed to be simple to use and be a reflection of the desktop version.

Decent app overall Decent app overall, but missing a really simple, key feature that many of its users want. Calculate net carbs. Anyone doing keto needs this. Pretty crazy this app doesn‚Äôt have it - it‚Äôs just simple subtraction. Many other apps have this feature and MyFitnessPal should really add it.

Super Helpful This app is amazing for people who are really tryna to keep track of how much and what they are eating. Some days Im so busy I forget to eat 3 meals a day and this app helps remind me that I need to eat! Definitely recommend
Efficient This app makes tracking your calorie intake the day super easy. You can even save recipes you make at home to make them easier to enter into the app
